TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit NavigationFailedEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

remarks.format:
## Remarks 这些事件参数包含有关导航失败，并传递给处理程序的信息**NavigationFailed**事件，由以下实现：
- <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationFailed?displayProperty=nameWithType>
- <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.NavigationFailed?displayProperty=nameWithType>
- <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.NavigationFailed?displayProperty=nameWithType>
- <xref:System.Windows.Application.NavigationFailed?displayProperty=nameWithType>
<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationFailedEventArgs> 封装导航失败的请求的以下详细信息：
- **导航发起**: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationFailedEventArgs.Navigator%2A>。
- **导航异常**: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationFailedEventArgs.Exception%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationFailedEventArgs.Handled%2A>。
- **导航内容**: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationFailedEventArgs.Uri%2A>。
- **导航的详细信息**: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationFailedEventArgs.WebRequest%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationFailedEventArgs.WebResponse%2A>。
- **导航状态**: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationFailedEventArgs.ExtraData%2A>。

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Exception As Exception
public: property Exception ^ Exception { Exception ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the that was raised as the result of a failed navigation.
Docs.value: 结果因导航失败而引发。

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ExtraData As Object
public: property System::Object ^ ExtraData { System::Object ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the optional data that was passed when navigation commenced.
Docs.value: 可选数据导航开始时传递的。

remarks.format: ## Remarks <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationFailedEventArgs.ExtraData%2A> 可以用于传递特定于特定导航的特定于上下文的数据。 <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationFailedEventArgs.ExtraData%2A> 包含对在调用时，作为第二个参数传递的对象的引用<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A>。 否则，它是 `null`。

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool Handled { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.Handled : bool with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets whether the failed navigation exception has been handled.
Docs.value: 如果处理了异常;否则为（默认值）。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当处理<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationFailed>到进程因导航失败，而引发的异常，不希望[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)]若要继续处理该异常，应设置<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationFailedEventArgs.Handled%2A>属性设置为`true`。

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Navigator As Object
public: property System::Object ^ Navigator { System::Object ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: The navigator that raised this event.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Uri As Uri
public: property Uri ^ Uri { Uri ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] for the content that could not be navigated to.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property WebRequest As WebRequest
public: property System::Net::WebRequest ^ WebRequest { System::Net::WebRequest ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the web request that was used to request the specified content.
Docs.value: 获取用于请求指定的内容对象。 导航到对象，如果是。

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Net.WebRequest?displayProperty=nameWithType> 是一个抽象基类，用于封装 web 请求，并且协议不可知。 为每个常用的协议，.NET Framework 包括派生的类<xref:System.Net.WebRequest?displayProperty=nameWithType>并将其扩展使用特定于协议的状态和行为，包括：
- <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackWebRequest>:[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)]使用`pack://`方案来请求应用程序数据文件 (请参阅[WPF 应用程序资源、 内容和数据文件](~/docs/framework/wpf/app-development/wpf-application-resource-content-and-data-files.md))。
- <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest>:[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)]使用`http://`方案从 Web 服务器请求文件。
- <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest>:[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)]使用`ftp://`方案从 FTP 服务器请求文件。
- <xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest>:[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)]使用`file://`方案请求本地文件。

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property WebResponse As WebResponse
public: property System::Net::WebResponse ^ WebResponse { System::Net::WebResponse ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the web response that was returned after attempting to download the requested the specified content.
Docs.value: 之后尝试下载请求返回指定的内容。 如果导航失败，是。

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Net.WebResponse?displayProperty=nameWithType> 是一个抽象基类，用于封装 web 响应，并且协议不可知。 为每个常用的协议，.NET Framework 包括派生的类<xref:System.Net.WebResponse?displayProperty=nameWithType>并将其扩展使用特定于协议的状态，包括：
- <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackWebResponse>:[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)]使用`pack://`方案来请求应用程序数据文件 (请参阅[WPF 应用程序资源、 内容和数据文件](~/docs/framework/wpf/app-development/wpf-application-resource-content-and-data-files.md))。
- <xref:System.Net.HttpWebResponse>:[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)]使用`http://`方案从 Web 服务器请求文件。
- <xref:System.Net.FtpWebResponse>:[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)]使用`ftp://`方案从 FTP 服务器请求文件。
- <xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse>:[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)]使用`file://`方案请求本地文件。
